articles.title: Smartphone Users Warned To Delete "Dangerous" Apps. Check List - NDTV
articles.description: Tech experts have issued a warning for smartphone users to delete some "dangerous" financial apps from their phones as they have been found to be infected with malware.
articles.content:
These "dangerous" apps are known as SpyLoan apps. (Representative pic)
